projects.title: AI-Powered Drone Log Analysis Tool
projects.subtitle: Real-time ULog processing with interactive AI chat - Transforms drone debugging from hours to minutes
projects.description: Web-based flight data analysis tool that processes PX4 drone ULog files with real-time AI analysis, comprehensive health checks, and interactive chat interface for flight-specific insights.
projects.impact: Transforms drone debugging from hours to minutes with automated analysis across 11+ health categories

videos.title: AI-Powered Drone Flight Log Analysis in Action
videos.description: Live demonstration showing how the tool analyzes PX4 flight logs, provides instant health checks, and enables interactive chat with flight data using local AI.

details.overview: A comprehensive web-based solution for analyzing PX4 drone flight logs using AI. The tool processes ULog files in real-time, provides automated health checks across 11+ critical systems, and features an interactive chat interface powered by local Llama 3.2 AI model for flight-specific insights.
features: Real-time AI analysis with streaming token-by-token responses
Comprehensive health checks for IMU, GPS, battery, actuators, and more
Interactive AI chat interface with flight data context
Visual pass/fail indicators with timestamp-precise error detection
ULog file parsing optimized for PX4 flight controllers
Exportable parameter diffs and application logs
Smart caching to avoid redundant analysis
Batch and single file processing support
details.architecture: Built with React frontend and Python Flask backend, connected via WebSocket for real-time updates. Uses Ollama server running local Llama 3.2 model for AI analysis. Deployed using Docker Compose for easy scaling and maintenance.

projects.title: Smart Grid Analytics
projects.subtitle: Energy systems optimization - Improved energy distribution efficiency, predictive maintenance
projects.description: AI agent for smart grid data analysis, optimizing energy distribution patterns and predicting system performance.
projects.impact: Improved energy distribution efficiency, predictive maintenance

details.overview: Created an AI agent system for analyzing smart grid data to optimize energy distribution patterns and predict system performance. The solution processes real-time grid data to make intelligent decisions about energy routing and load balancing.
features: Real-time grid data processing and analysis
Predictive modeling for demand forecasting
Automated load balancing optimization
System health monitoring and maintenance alerts

projects.title: Travel Recommendation App
projects.subtitle: Personalized AI planning system - Personalized travel experiences, automated itinerary generation
projects.description: Intelligent recommendation engine combining user preferences with real-time information for personalized experiences.
projects.impact: Personalized travel experiences, automated itinerary generation

details.overview: Built an intelligent recommendation engine that combines user preferences, historical travel data, and real-time information to create personalized travel experiences and automated itinerary suggestions.
features: Personalized destination recommendations
Automated itinerary planning and optimization
Real-time price and availability tracking
User preference learning and adaptation

projects.title: Precision Delivery Drone (Baton)
projects.subtitle: Master's thesis project - Research foundation for autonomous delivery systems
projects.description: Coaxial copter designed for precise payload delivery using controlled descent mechanism. Developed as Master's thesis at WSU under Dr. Matthew E. Taylor's supervision.
projects.impact: Research foundation for autonomous delivery systems

videos.title: Just for FUN : My ever drone
videos.description: First ever RC drone built - coax motor with lipo battery, RC receiver. Goes straight up with throttle command. First mock-up of the Baton drone project.

videos.title: Baton Drone - Drop and recovery - Functionality test simulation
videos.description: Real-world simulation demonstrating controlled descent mechanism. Control loops activate when dropped from aerial vehicle, regains control, then descends to programmed target location.

media.title: Baton Drone Hardware
media.description: Physical prototype of the Baton precision delivery drone showing coaxial rotor design and payload delivery mechanism.

media.title: JCATI Conference Poster 2018
media.description: Research poster presenting Baton: A Low-Cost Aerial Delivery Vehicle at JCATI Conference 2018, showcasing evolution of design and flight control software.

details.overview: Master's thesis project developing 'Baton', a precision delivery drone with advanced navigation algorithms and autonomous decision-making capabilities. The objective was to deliver payloads precisely using controlled descent mechanism. This project marked the beginning of my journey into robotics and autonomous systems.
features: Autonomous navigation and path planning
Precision delivery mechanisms with controlled descent
Drop and recovery functionality
Target location programming and navigation
Coaxial rotor design for stability

projects.title: Advanced Flight Control Systems (Lumenier)
projects.subtitle: Custom modes & sensor integration - Enhanced flight capabilities in challenging environments, GPS-denied operations
projects.description: Developed custom PX4 flight modes including Toss-to-Launch and room surveillance systems with 360° obstacle avoidance capabilities.
projects.impact: Enhanced flight capabilities in challenging environments, GPS-denied operations

videos.title: Room surveillance simulation PX4 - obstacle avoidance, gps/gps denied position hold
videos.description: Surveillance drone with 3 LiDAR sensors per arm for 360° coverage, optical flow sensors for z-plane obstacle avoidance. Enables position hold under different lighting conditions with/without GPS.

videos.title: Toss to launch - custom flight mode - PX4
videos.description: Custom flight mode implementation: drone detects freefall when tossed, applies high throttle to break falling velocity, stabilizes, then transitions to programmed actions. Implemented in 2021 before official PX4 support.

details.overview: Developed custom flight modes in PX4 flight controller for surveillance and specialized launch operations. Created room surveillance system for abandoned buildings and rescue operations, plus innovative toss-to-launch functionality.
features: Toss-to-launch custom flight mode with freefall detection
360° obstacle avoidance with multiple LiDAR sensors
GPS-denied position hold with optical flow
Multi-lighting condition operation capability
Room surveillance automation for first responders

projects.title: Support Automation Tools
projects.subtitle: Cross-functional integration systems - 40% reduction in support tickets, 30% improvement in team productivity
projects.description: Developed diagnostic infrastructure and automated workflows, achieving 40% reduction in support tickets.
projects.impact: 40% reduction in support tickets, 30% improvement in team productivity

details.overview: Engineered comprehensive diagnostic tools and automated workflows to streamline customer support operations. This experience revealed the potential for automation in customer-facing roles, sparking the transition to AI agent development.
features: Automated diagnostic systems
Workflow automation tools
Comprehensive documentation generation
Integration with existing support systems

projects.title: Robotics R&D Engineer
projects.subtitle: York Exponential projects - Multi-Robot Control System focusing on platform independence
projects.description: Developed prototype software for autonomous surveillance mobile robots and Human Machine Interface for collaborative robotic arm welding application.
projects.impact: Multi-Robot Control System focusing on platform independence

videos.title: Weld bot HMI (Human Machine Interface)
videos.description: Interface designed to help welding robot operators program robots with minimal clicks. UI developed using Kivy framework in Python, communicating with robot controller via ROS2.

details.overview: Developed prototype software for in-house autonomous surveillance mobile robots and Human Machine Interface for collaborative robotic arm welding applications.
features: Prototype software for autonomous surveillance mobile robots
Human Machine Interface for Universal Robot welding application
Multi-Robot Control System with platform independence
